about_the_game:
Inspired by The Library of Babel by Jorge Luis Borges, the Infinite Art Museum is an endless collection of art. Our mission is to create a growing and enduring home for art in VR that is accessible to everyone.

Explore paintings, illustrations, digital art and photography from creators all over the world with more joining every week.

Visit the Infinite Art Museum website to learn more about our artists or join the IAM.

Number of IAM Artists: 71
Number of Original Works: 800+

Level One
  • Sreerag Praful
  • Tim Robinson
  • Naiane Pereira
  • Chelsea Baker
  • Katarina Meglic
  • Romer Kitching

  • Athina Kilimantzou
  • Richard King
  • Special Collection: Davey Jose

legal_notice: Other than screenshots from the use of the Infinite Art Museum application, no copying or use of art or images is allowed without permission from the appropriate artist.
name: Infinite Art Museum

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (AMD FX 8350) or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (AMD Radeon R9 290) or better
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Standing or Room Scale

short_description: The Infinite Art Museum is a free, permanent virtual reality museum and archive of art. Explore a growing collection of over 800 original paintings, illustrations, digital art and photographs from artists around the world.
